features: 【10 Brightness Eye-Caring & 3 Color Temperature】Long arm lamp provides Dimming Design (from 3200K to 6500K). Its light is very uniform, can prevent blue light damage to the eyes. This lamp is suitable for all ages, no matter the children or grandparents, easily protect your family's eyes.

【Memory Function & Many Scenes】The LED desk lamp has memory function, it will restore your last setting when you use next time. Suitable for office, workbench, reading room, painting, study, bedside table lighting, nail salon.

【Foldable Lamp Arm & Clamp Design】Space-Saving with a versatile three-axis design, provide more larger lighting area. Allows you to fix it in different directions. Easy to install. Extra wide metal clamp comes with silicone pads, supports up to 2 inches table top.

【LED Light Bead & USB Powered】With 80 LED Light Beads ,USB powered is easy to fit any available USB port to power the lamp Adapter include. LED is a green light source, cold light source that has low heat and can be touched safely. The voltage of the included adapter is 5V/2A. The length of the power cord is 59 inch.
【What will you get】 1x swing arm folding desk lamp (Material: Aluminum Alloy), 1x Metal Clamp, 1x FCC Power Adapter(5V/2A), 1x table lampstand,1x User Manual.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Whether you need comfortable reading light, focused office illumination, or relaxing ambient lighting, our modern desk lamp can meet your expectations.

Multiple color temperatures &adjustable brightness Modern desk lamp with adjustable 3 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels, providing you a personalized lighting experience. High Color Rendering Index. RAI > 90. Enhanced Color Reproduction for Realistic and Vibrant Object Rendering, Empowering Your Creativity.

Personalized Lighting Solution. Multi-angle Adjustable, Multiple Color Temperatures, Multiple Brightness Levels. Our desk lamp is designed with flexibility in mind, featuring multiple angle adjustment capabilities that allow you to adjust the direction and coverage of the light according to your needs. You can freely rotate and tilt the lamp head to illuminate the desired area, whether it's the task area on your desk or a specific spot in the room, effortlessly meeting your requirements. Customize color temperature and lighting intensity based on activities and moods for a personalized lighting experience
Meets lighting needs for various scenarios.

Are adapters included in the package? Yes, the product packaging includes a 5V2A adapter. It is suitable for voltage ranges from 100v to 240v. How is the lighting effect of this desk lamp? This desk lamp offers a variety of color temperature and brightness adjustment options. Its design aims to deliver even and soft illumination, avoiding glare and eye fatigue. Can the desk light remember the mode and brightness used last time it was turned off? Yes, the desk light has a memory function that remembers the last mode and brightness setting used before it was turned off. So when you turn it on again, it will automatically restore the previous mode and brightness level. How long does this lamp last? Is it energy efficient enough? This lamp lasts for years and is highly energy-efficient. With its energy-saving features and advanced technology, you can enjoy long-lasting illumination while minimizing energy consumption.

reviews.reviewerName: This is not a ginger ale!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An exceptional lighting solution for home offices and reading spaces
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a versatile and eye-caring desk lamp that offers multiple lighting modes, adjustable brightness levels, and a flexible design, this product is an excellent choice.The first thing that impressed me about this desk lamp is its build quality. The TROPICALTREE brand is known for producing high-quality lighting products, and this desk lamp lives up to that reputation. It is well-constructed with durable materials, ensuring its longevity and reliable performance. The lamp feels sturdy and solid, providing a stable and reliable lighting solution for your workspace.The flexibility and adjustability of this desk lamp are standout features. It features a swing arm design that allows you to adjust the lamp head and arm to your desired angle and position. This flexibility ensures optimal lighting placement for different tasks, such as reading, writing, or working on a computer. The 360-degree rotation capability further enhances the versatility of the lamp, allowing you to direct the light precisely where you need it.The TROPICALTREE LED Desk Lamp offers three lighting modes to cater to different needs and preferences. You can choose between warm white light, cool white light, or a combination of both. This variety of lighting modes ensures that you can create the ideal lighting environment for your specific tasks or mood. Whether you need a warm, cozy light for reading or a bright, cool light for focused work, this lamp has you covered.The lamp also provides ten adjustable brightness levels, allowing you to customize the intensity of the light to suit your needs. The dimmable feature is useful for different activities and lighting conditions. Whether you require soft ambient lighting or bright task lighting, this desk lamp offers the flexibility to adjust the brightness accordingly.The eye-caring feature of this lamp is worth highlighting. It utilizes LED technology with a diffuser panel to provide flicker-free and glare-free illumination. This helps reduce eye strain and fatigue, making it suitable for extended periods of reading or work. The even and gentle light distribution ensures a comfortable and eye-friendly lighting experience.The desk lamp comes with a clamp that allows for easy installation on various surfaces, such as desks, tables, or shelves. The clamp provides a secure and stable attachment without taking up valuable space on your work surface. The installation process is simple and hassle-free, allowing you to quickly set up the lamp in your desired location.In conclusion, the TROPICALTREE LED Desk Lamp is an exceptional lighting solution that combines versatility, adjustability, and eye-caring features. With its high-quality construction, flexible design, multiple lighting modes, adjustable brightness levels, and easy installation, this desk lamp provides everything you need for a comfortable and efficient lighting experience in your home office or reading space. Whether you're a student, professional, or avid reader, this desk lamp will exceed your expectations and enhance your productivity and enjoyment of tasks requiring focused illumination.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very bright, great range of motion, yet compact in size
reviews.reviewText: My daughter wanted a white reading light, this fit the description and size she was looking for. Assembled in a minute, and the light is very bright, has excellent range of motion, plus offers a heavy base or the option to clamp down to the desk edge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good brightness, good configurability but lacking longevity
reviews.reviewText: Owned this lamp for over a year and it has served me very well. Most people who see it compliment how well it works.However recently it has been acting up. The usb port itself seems to be loose/ dislodged from the wire and leads to the light flickering, low brightness and resetting of modes.Wish that it had lasted longer as it is one of the few things that I would want to keep using forever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best Lamp Ever!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this original for my office space and I loved it so much I ended up putting it on my bedside shelf and it is PERFECT! The warm light setting is perfect for reading before bed or when I’m doing something on my phone or iPad it just helps me wind down so much! Currently ordering a second one for my office. For the price this lamp is great, it’s fully adjustable and spins around easily and stays in place great for studying or brightening up a dim work space!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfectly and perfect for what I need!
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is exactly what I was looking for! I like the way it will stretch to be over what you’re doing and it will swivel around out of the way as well. Perfect for my needs!Edit: I bought it on July 29, 2023 and it’s now January 18, 2024. This lamp was exactly what I was looking for BUT it died last night. Just completely quit working. I did read in some of the reviews that they had issues with it not lasting very long, those were all very true.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great extending arm - easy to adjust, firm
reviews.reviewText: Like the adjustable lighting options. Other reviews say the light fails over time. It works fine for me. A solid purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect light for projects
reviews.reviewText: This is my second purchase. These lights are light-weight, have many settings, and a good range-of-motion so that I can position the light where I need it most. In the past, I purchased Ott lights. Once I found these, which are more inexpensive, much easier to use, and offer a wide variety of brightness and types of light, I will not purchase any other type of light again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It was good, while it lasted.
reviews.reviewText: It worked well, while it lasted. Love that it was white and slender. We had to buy it a second time, after the first wouldn't want to turn on after a few months. The second lamp did the same. Only lasted a few months, with the same reason that it didn't want to turn on. Wish it lasted much longer as it worked for what I needed it for.
I use this lamp for painting miniatures! Very adjustable and gives off a good light source making it easy to see what I am doing.

This lamp worked great for 5 months then it died. The plug and USB were extremely hot and the USB looked burned. Good thing I looked at it when it stopped working otherwise it could've cause a fire. I'm very disappointed because now I have to go searching for another one and I'm nervous to buy a similar type in case the same thing happens.

great stability, great joint adjustments, easy to set up. short cord. only downside. the brightness levels are ranging but within a small range. heats up a bit, and has that new electronics smell the first few times you use it forsure, but overall decent desk lamp. the block also tends to run warm.
For my mother she was having a hard time seeing when she was doing puzzles
Nice desk lamp with adjustable brightness. Not only for a desk. Anywhere, where you can screw the base to. Would recommend !
